author: Jinyu Liu
title: 1b boxify
question:
Why is my check-expect not passing? 
And I see from the solution there isn't a test for the base case. How do I know when to include a base case or not?
(check-expect (boxify empty-image) empty-image)

(define (boxify i)
  (overlay (rectangle (image-width i)
                      (image-height i)
                      "outline"
                      "black")
           i))
student_answer:
(rectangle 0 0 "outline" "black")
Hey, this is very strange but apparently when you run this code it is NOT an empty image, there is a small dot produced, maybe that is why and it is a product of how racket deals with images?
